title: Interpretation of a fisherman in a dream: Seeing fishing in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a hunter for single people, for married women, for pregnant women, for divorced women, whether it is hunting, or marine animals, or birds, or animals, on the hook, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a hunter in a dream: Hunting in a dream means spoils, so whoever sees that he has hunted a deer, a wild goat, or A rabbit or a wild donkey, he will get money and spoils. If he saw her. He shoots a bird or a cow for purposes other than hunting, then he shoots a woman or a slave. Whoever sees hounds going hunting, this is good for everyone, and if he sees them returning from hunting, this indicates that the panic has passed, and if he sees them entering the city, it shows unemployment. If she dreams of catching fresh sweet fish from the sea, this indicates her legitimate cause and endeavor. A man’s hunting indicates that he has cheated in his opinion and efforts. If he is single, he will get married, and if he marries, a child will be born. The slave’s hunting is evidence of what he gets from his master’s money. Hunting young children is evidence of the knowledge or industry he retains or what he inherits from his parents. A fishing trap in a dream represents deception and deception, and whoever sees that he has fallen into a trap will fall into deception. Whoever sets a trap and catches a beast or bird, he will find food through cunning and cunning. See also Hunting: A hunter in a dream is a man who turns towards women and deceives them in their quest. The hunter may have referred to the slave, the dove owner, or the master of the book. The fisherman is a great and cunning sultan who deceives the sultans. The hunter of falcons, falcons, and birds is a great ruler. The fisherman is the man who deceives great people. The monster hunter deceives strangers. A hunter gathers wives and maids. The vision of the enemy indicates the victory of the debtors. The dream of the hunter is interpreted by the man who cheats for a living by deceit and deception, and his profit may be from women to overcome them. The hunter of predatory animals of beasts and birds is interpreted by an unjust king who wins. The arrogant and the hunter interprets the demand for livelihood on the part of the woman so that he can hunt. Interpretation of a dream about fishing - YouTube

title: Interpretation of escaping in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing myself running away in a dream for a single girl. Seeing someone chasing me. Seeing myself running away from someone running and hiding from someone I know who wants to kill me. Stalking Escape with someone you love or from the police. Aside from those who want to attack Ibn Sirin and more, escaping in a dream is one of the dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, and it brings us many important meanings and associations, as the dream causes a state of anxiety and confusion in the dreamer, as we see escaping from many things, whether it is. Imprisonment, escaping from someone, escaping from problems, and other things that bother us in many of our dreams, and we will explain to you the interpretation of escaping in a dream, as Ibn Sirin interpreted it in his interpretations. Interpretation of escaping in a dream for a single girl: Every girl sees running in a dream or that someone is chasing her for a reason or To another. This dream indicates deep psychological problems. If a girl sees that someone who is chasing her has caught her, she will face a major crisis. If she sees escape in a dream and manages to escape, this dream foretells her that she will overcome all adversity and enjoy a life full of peace and stability. Seeing a single woman running in A dream about someone chasing her means that she is facing psychological problems and wants to escape from them. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream trying to escape from someone who was chasing her and grabbing her is evidence that she was able to face many problems. Interpretation of escaping in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Escaping in a dream is evidence of the problems that The dreamer suffers from it in life. Escape in a dream also indicates the effort made to achieve many successes and he will gain ample livelihood. If the dreamer sees someone chasing him in a dream, it means that there is a jealous person in the dreamer’s life who wants to lose grace. Seeing someone leaving the house in a dream It means that there are many problems and that he is running to confront them and solve them. Seeing the dreamer running away from someone who wants to kill him in a dream means that the dreamer is afraid of a specific thing and wants to run away from it. Whoever sees in a dream that he is running away from an unknown person, it is evidence of his responsibility. If you see yourself running away from An unknown person in a dream, it also means that you will face many problems. Escaping from the police in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will achieve many achievements in the near future. Also, seeing someone running from a police car in a dream means that he will fail in many tasks. Interpretation Escape in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman being run over by an unknown person in a dream means that she is suffering from family and marital problems. Seeing a married woman running in a dream also indicates that she wants to escape from marital problems. Seeing a married woman running away from someone who is chasing her in a dream means that she is trying to escape. Of some things that happened to her in the past. A married woman escaping from her husband in a dream indicates that she is facing a lot of financial difficulties. Seeing a married woman escaping from her husband in a dream also indicates her desire to divorce her husband in the near future. The success of a married woman in escaping From her husband in the dream indicates that she will separate from her husband in the future

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a promise in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a promise in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, and knowing the good and bad vision of a marriage promise according to what is stated in the interpretation books. Many dreams come to mind in a dream, and we do not know the correct scientific interpretation of that, but when we see a promise in a dream, it must symbolize There are many real signs and indicators in our lives. Many people want to get an interpretation of seeing the promise of marriage and engagement. What is the interpretation of a dream about the promise of money? And other common questions about seeing a promise in a dream, dreaming of preaching, seeing a promise of travel, so we will deal with the interpretation of seeing a promise in a dream, the interpretation of seeing a promise of action, all of this we will learn in detail. Interpretation of seeing a promise by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned seeing a promise in A dream in which someone sees a good promise is evidence of the good livelihood and abundance he will receive and his long life. Seeing the dreamer as his enemy and promising him a good promise in a dream that happened to him or to someone else. As for the dreamer who received a bad promise from his enemy in a dream, this indicates that he will obtain goodness. Whether from him or from someone else. The dream interpretation of a promise in a dream is similar to the debt promised to the person to whom it was promised. Dreaming of a lover’s smile and the fulfillment of the promise in a dream is evidence of the strength of faith and reassurance. The dream symbolizes a promise in a dream. This refers to the good that comes to me. The dream of a person who promised me in a dream is a sign of the goodness and blessing of this promise. Interpretation of seeing a promise for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing a promise in a dream where the girl sees that she is pledging to someone that she will agree to marry him. The interpretation of a dream about a promise to marry an unmarried woman in a dream Evidence that she will be fascinated by him. When a single girl sees that someone is promising her in a dream, it is evidence of the money that she will receive in her life. The interpretation of dreams about a lover’s promise in a dream shows how sincere this person is and fulfilling his promise to her, which is to marry her soon. Interpretation of seeing a promise for a married woman Interpretation of seeing a promise in a dream where you see that it does not fulfill is evidence that he is a hypocritical person and fears being betrayed. Seeing a broken promise in a dream is a sign of divorce. A satisfied married woman in a dream indicates a happy and fulfilling life in her life. Seeing a promise in a dream for a man dead due to evil indicates decency and disobedience. Interpretation of seeing a promise for a man: The interpretation of seeing a promise in a dream about a woman’s marriage is evidence that she conveys bad feelings and temptations to others. Seeing a broken promise in a dream is evidence that he is an honest and hypocritical person. A man who sees himself promising money to someone in a dream is evidence that he will find a certain job soon. The interpretation of seeing a promise to help a specific person in a dream is evidence that he will receive goodness and blessings in his life. The interpretation of a promise in a dream and its fulfillment indicates the sincerity of this person. Interpretation of seeing someone else’s promise: The dream interpretation of a promise in a dream that actually exists, in reality, indicates the sincerity of this promise, in reality, and the dreamer’s interest in fulfilling it. The interpretation of a dream about a promise to others in a dream It is evidence that you are seeing the dream, and dreaming about it

title: The most famous 13+ dreams of mistletoe and sheep mistletoe in a dream

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s dream of general mistletoe. Interpretation of dreams. Local mistletoe in a dream indicates an increase in money and a lot of profits achieved by the founder. Municipal mistletoe in a dream indicates the achievement of goals. As for someone who sees in his dream that he is selling local glass, this indicates a lack of livelihood. Seeing the ringing of mistletoe in a dream indicates Achieving inheritance. Interpretation of seeing sheep mistletoe by Al-Nabulsi. If a person sees sheep fat in the food he eats in a dream, this indicates traveling to other countries for hiking and entertainment. A dream about tasting sheep mistletoe indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals. Seeing him pouring sheep ghee in a dream or mistletoe is evidence of losing money. Dreaming of the smell of mistletoe in a dream indicates financial loss and crises in which the dreamer falls. Dreaming of local mistletoe for individuals. Dreaming of an unmarried girl in a dream that she buys mistletoe, this indicates engagement and marriage in the near future. If you see a dream of tasting local mistletoe, this indicates the purity and chastity of this girl. If he sees that it tastes like ghee and it tastes delicious, this indicates the happiness and joy that he will get. If he sees local mistletoe in a dream, it shows some problems that he faces. Dream of sheep mistletoe for a married woman Seeing a married woman cooking sheep ghee in a dream is a sign of great sustenance and abundant kindness Selling sheep ghee in a dream to a married woman is evidence of a little money that she will get soon. Seeing a married woman taking sheep ghee from some people is evidence of the collapse of anxiety and recovery from illness. Seeing a dream of primitive mistletoe for a man. If a person dreams that he is drinking ghee, this indicates an abundance of nutrition. And an increase in money. See the erosion of the mistletoe. The municipality is not modern, and this indicates failure in the future. title: What is the interpretation of eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?  The large black eggplant in the dream, and the white eggplant in the dream

preview.html: Seeing eggplant in a dream has different meanings, including joy and sadness. It is known that eggplant is one of the most important and necessary popular dishes, as it is eaten fried, grilled, stewed, or pickled, and each form has a different interpretation. Therefore, you will learn about all the meanings of happiness and sadness through the opinions of dear commentators. Eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Eggplant in a dream. The interpretation of eggplant in a dream varies according to taste and shape. , as it has good meanings for the dreamer if its color is white, but it causes a feeling of pain and sadness if it is black, in both cases it is necessary. Getting closer to God and constant supplications. We also find that taste changes the meaning of the dream, because its delicious taste in a dream indicates goodness, but its bad taste does not express goodness, rather it is an indication of entering into problems that can be solved with patience and supplication to God Almighty. If the dreamer sees it in His time, this is evidence of the huge diet on which he lives these days. As for seeing it at an inappropriate time, it leads to wrong things these days, but he will notice them later. The vision expresses going through all the sorrows and worries that the dreamer suffers from in his life in order to He lives at the level he desires. Harvesting it before its expiration date means that the dreamer carries in his heart hatred and malice towards someone, and here he must leave this trait very soon. Planting is a sign of goodness and comfort in the coming season and not being affected by any evil (God willing The spoilage of eggplant in a dream means that the dreamer does not receive many things in his life, but it is necessary for him to be satisfied with everything that the Lord of the Worlds has written so that we can obtain everything we want. Also, seeing spoiled eggplant with a bad taste leads to him being affected by some pressures. In work that causes the dreamer to be distracted for a period of time, but he will return stronger than before. Eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Our Sheikh Ibn Sirin explains this vision to us, explaining that his vision leads the dreamer to distress and distress, causing him harm for a short period of time. We also find Seeing it at its proper time is much better than at any other time because it expresses happiness and joy in the dreamer’s life and good news. The vision expresses the achievement of the goals and objectives that the dreamer seeks throughout his life. If the stuffed eggplant in the dream represents comfort and goodness, then there is no doubt that eating stuffed eggplant is delicious. Very, so seeing it is a promising sign for the dreamer. Frying it in oil indicates that the dreamer will find the appropriate job, as he always desires and dreams, in terms of material and social comfort. Eating it in a dream is a promising sign of reaching dreams and aspirations and living in prosperity and happiness. Likewise, eating it in a dream is a promising sign of reaching dreams and aspirations and living in prosperity and happiness. In a dream, it may indicate the envy that surrounds the dreamer from both relatives and strangers. Interpretation of eggplant in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explains to us that seeing this dream indicates the dreamer’s rise in his work and the achievement of everything he dreams about. If the eggplant is rotten and cannot be eaten, this leads to many Of the sins that the dreamer lives with

Getting closer to God and constant supplications. We also find that taste changes the meaning of the dream, because its delicious taste in a dream indicates goodness, but its bad taste does not express goodness, rather it is an indication of entering into problems that can be solved with patience and supplication to God Almighty. If the dreamer sees it in His time, this is evidence of the huge diet on which he lives these days. As for seeing it at an inappropriate time, it leads to wrong things these days, but he will notice them later. The vision expresses going through all the sorrows and worries that the dreamer suffers from in his life in order to He lives at the level he desires. Harvesting it before its expiration date means that the dreamer carries in his heart hatred and malice towards someone, and here he must leave this trait very soon. Planting is a sign of goodness and comfort in the coming season and not being affected by any evil (God willing The spoilage of eggplant in a dream means that the dreamer does not receive many things in his life, but it is necessary for him to be satisfied with everything that the Lord of the Worlds has written so that we can obtain everything we want. Also, seeing spoiled eggplant with a bad taste leads to him being affected by some pressures. In work that causes the dreamer to be distracted for a period of time, but he will return stronger than before. Eggplant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Our Sheikh Ibn Sirin explains this vision to us, explaining that his vision leads the dreamer to distress and distress, causing him harm for a short period of time. We also find Seeing it at its proper time is much better than at any other time because it expresses happiness and joy in the dreamer’s life and good news. The vision expresses the achievement of the goals and objectives that the dreamer seeks throughout his life. If the stuffed eggplant in the dream represents comfort and goodness, then there is no doubt that eating stuffed eggplant is delicious. Very, so seeing it is a promising sign for the dreamer. Frying it in oil indicates that the dreamer will find the appropriate job, as he always desires and dreams, in terms of material and social comfort. Eating it in a dream is a promising sign of reaching dreams and aspirations and living in prosperity and happiness. Likewise, eating it in a dream is a promising sign of reaching dreams and aspirations and living in prosperity and happiness. In a dream, it may indicate the envy that surrounds the dreamer from both relatives and strangers. Interpretation of eggplant in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explains to us that seeing this dream indicates the dreamer’s rise in his work and the achievement of everything he dreams about. If the eggplant is rotten and cannot be eaten, this leads to many Of the sins that the dreamer lives with

title: Interpretation of writing in a dream and book in a dream

preview.html: Seeing writing and who writes in a dream about an unmarried person, about a married woman, about a pregnant woman, about a divorced person, about a man, whether he writes the name or dreams, write a letter to Ibn Sirin, to Al-Nabulsi, to Imam Al-Sadiq and more. Writing Interpretation of a dream about writing in a dream has different interpretations with different meanings and connotations, which differ according to the owner of the vision, whether he is a man or a woman, but also depending on the difference in the social status of the dreamer, whether he is single or married I dream that you are writing in a dream In this article, interpretation of writing in a dream Writing is interpreted in different ways. Whoever sees himself writing wrongly and is illiterate, he is collecting food from people by deception and cunning, and if he is a writer or a scholar and sees himself writing, it is goodness, charity and attainment. A lot of food. Interpretation of writing in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is writing it on paper, this indicates the contradiction between the dreamer and the people around him. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is writing in a newspaper, this indicates that the dreamer will soon receive an inheritance, and God knows best. If a person sees a sacred text being read in a dream without understanding it, this indicates that the dreamer has defeated his enemies If you see writing in a dream without understanding it, this indicates weak insight in religious matters And seeing a dream of poorly written writing is evidence of the repentance of the one who sees it Seeing the verses of the Qur’an written in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s good religion and righteousness. This indicates that the dreamer earns his money in the wrong way. Interpretation of writing in a single dream If an unmarried girl sees that she is writing beautifully in her dream, this means that the owner of the vision is characterized by honesty and clarity with those around her and with herself. She will repent to God and abandon sins. An unmarried girl sees that she is writing something incomprehensible in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is very bored in her life, but if the writing is understandable and clear, this means that the dreamer will receive good and happy news, God willing, and if an unmarried girl sees ugly letters in a dream, this indicates the general bad condition of the woman who has the vision. Interpretation of writing in a dream about a married woman If a married woman sees that she is writing in her dream and the writing is good, this means that the owner of the vision is responsible for her home and children well. In the life of insight, God willing. Interpretation of my book in a pregnant woman’s dream If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is writing with a blue pen, this means that the dreamer will face problems and difficulties related to her pregnancy. As for if a pregnant woman sees that she is learning to write in her dream, this indicates that the owner of the vision will give birth to a child who is characterized by good morals and will make her happy in her life, God willing. Interpretation of writing in a man’s dream If a man sees in his dream that he is writing texts in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer is characterized by balance and good morals. Seeing writing names in a man’s dream means that these names have a special importance in his life. Seeing writing in a notebook - YouTube Interpretation of seeing the Holy Book - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pistol in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi: A pistol, or what is known as a revolver, is a firearm used by police and security personnel, and some people may use it for protection, but when purchasing it, they must have a license to use this weapon. This weapon is considered deadly and harmful, so it must be kept in a safe place out of the reach of children and people who cannot use it. Today and until today, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi. Does seeing it look good or bad? Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi for a single girl: If An unmarried girl dreamed of a gun. This dream indicates that if the girl approaches him, she will break up with her fiancé, and God knows best. Also, seeing a gun in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that there are many difficulties and problems and that this girl is suffering from bad luck. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream Ibn Sirin for a single girl: The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a gun for an unmarried and engaged girl, and this indicates that her fiancé is a corrupt person with bad morals and may indicate the end of this relationship. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted one girl’s vision of a weapon as an indication that this girl has suffered from hardships. And adversity in all aspects of her life. If a girl dreams of a gun and smiles, this means that someone is trying to harm her, but she will get rid of him and her harm, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl dreams of throwing the gun away from herself, this means that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she faces in her life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is buying a gun in a dream, this means that she lives with her husband a life full of security. If a married woman dreams that she shoots a thief, this means that she will get rid of problems and worries. If she dreams A married woman dreams that she shoots people she knows, whether they are relatives or friends, then this vision is considered an unpleasant vision and portends evil. If a married woman dreams of shooting at security men, this means that she will face many problems in her life. Interpretation of seeing a gun in A pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman dreams of a gun in a dream, this indicates that the gender of her baby is male, and God knows best. If a woman dreams that she hears gunshots, this means that her due date is approaching, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream for a man: If A man dreams of a gun, it means that he will gain strength and righteousness in his life and also shows his self-respect. If a man dreams of a gun in a dream and the color of the gun is black, this indicates protection and security. But if a man dreams of a white gun, this indicates abundant wealth. If a man dreams that he He shoots someone, it means that he has committed sins. If a man dreams that he has lost his gun, this means that he has lost his place in his job or his place in society. If a man dreams that he is shooting bullets in the air, it means that he is a spendthrift. Interpretation of a dream about a child carrying a gun If one dreams of seeing a child carrying a gun, this indicates that the dreamer is...

title: Crying out of fear of God in a dream

preview.html: The dream indicates good meanings, which we present to you through our translator in the following lines, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing crying out of fear of God in a dream for an unmarried girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is crying in a dream out of fear of God and regrets it. It is an indication that God Almighty will rid her of her worries. Among the bad deeds that she sees in her life are the unmarried girl who looked at prayer in a dream and cried out of fear of God in the dream. The clear interpretation is that she will regulate herself in her prayers and bring her life closer to God Almighty. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is screaming out of fear of God in... All aspects of her life. It appears here that he will get rid of the great sad things that he was going through and living through. And if the unmarried woman who dreams sees in a dream that she is screaming in fear of God, and rejoices in Him. It indicates that she will learn a lot from the Holy Qur’an in this period of her life, God willing. God. See also: A detailed interpretation of crying in a dream. Interpretation of crying for fear of God in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees herself in a dream praying and screaming out of fear of God Almighty. She explains that she will put an end to the sorrows she is experiencing and the bad things she sees in her life during this time. And if A married woman dreamed that she was approaching God and screaming in fear of Him Almighty. Here it indicates that the hardships in her life will end, and that she will be very happy with her life, God willing. If a married woman in a dream looks at her husband’s prayer and screams in fear of God, this indicates that she and her husband are approaching God Almighty. In their lives, and God knows best. If a married woman tries to talk to her children in a dream, and screams out of fear of God. This indicates that she will live her life with great comfort and happiness in her life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing crying out of fear of God in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream She screams in fear of God in a dream and becomes happy. She explains that she will achieve many of the desires she wants in her life, God willing. Or an absolute vision in a dream that her ex-husband was praying and screaming in fear of God. She declares that she will return to her ex-husband, and that she will live happily ever after, God willing. God. And the divorced dreamer who sees that she is crying in a dream for fear of God in her life and in her affairs. This shows that she will succeed in many of the things she is dealing with at this time in her life. And if the divorced woman looks at her life, her health, and her diet, and cries for fear of God in a dream. She announces that she will succeed in doing many good deeds in her life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing screaming out of fear of God in a dream about the man and its meaning. Whoever sees in his dream that he is crying out of fear of God in his sleep, then he will be very sorry. This indicates that God Almighty will relieve him of his distress in this world. And it saves him from torment. If the dreamer screams in a dream out of fear of God Almighty in the dream and he is happy. This means that he will get rid of the things that make him very sad in his life and comfort, God willing. And if the dreamer looks at prayer in a dream and cries out of fear of God Almighty. Here is a sign. Until this dreamer will put an end to many...

title: Interpretation of seeing a shoe heel repaired in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of repairing the heel of a shoe in a dream: The vision symbolizes the dreamer’s desire to correct the mistakes he has committed in his life. The vision of repairing the heel of a shoe portends relief from distress, the death of distress, and intimate solutions to the dreamer’s life. The dream suggests reconsidering some of the decisions that the dreamer made and discovering that they were Wrong. Cleaning the heel of a shoe in a dream indicates starting a new business, where the dreamer will make a lot of profits and money. Seeing the heel of a shoe being polished indicates the prestigious position that the dreamer will reach. If a married man sees himself repairing the heel of his shoe in a dream, he will be happy. By raising his children well and teaching them good morals from an early age. The dreamer seeing that someone else is repairing the heel of his shoe is a warning against revealing many private secrets in front of others. Interpretation of a married woman taking off the heel of a shoe If a married woman sees in her dream that she is taking off the heel of her shoe, this indicates problems The marriage she is currently facing. Restoring high heels in a dream symbolizes the death of marital problems and disputes and the justice of life between spouses. Wearing high-heeled shoes in a dream is evidence of her high morals and the stability of her relationship with her husband. Seeing high heels symbolizes feeling safe and living happily. Seeing her wearing high-heeled shoes indicates However, the woman will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Not feeling comfortable when wearing heels in a dream indicates a woman’s failure in many matters, in addition to the instability of her psychological state and feelings of anxiety. Wearing new shoes in a dream indicates a woman’s ability to achieve a balance between her work and care. With her family affairs and taking care of her children. Black high-heeled shoes in a dream symbolize collecting a lot of money and profits after obtaining a new job. Seeing repairing the heel of a shoe in a dream for an unmarried woman. Repairing the heel of a shoe in a dream indicates improved economic conditions as a result of obtaining a new job. The vision predicts happiness that The girl experiences it because she achieves many of the things she seeks. The vision symbolizes a promotion at work and gaining a prestigious position. Wearing new shoes in a dream indicates a good job opportunity that will be available to you soon. Seeing silver high-heeled shoes symbolizes a close marriage and a feeling of happiness. It indicates Seeing black shoes indicates an engagement with a person of good morals and the engagement will take place within a few days after the dream. Wedding shoes in a dreamWearing bride shoes in a dream for a single womanCue Preparations for the wedding begin, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the birth of a beautiful and healthy fetus. The vision heralds the divorced woman With the beginning of a new life after the problems she was going through have ended. Seeing red heels in a dream: Seeing red shoes in a dream for unmarried women indicates the opportunity to associate with a good and suitable person. A married woman wearing red shoes in a dream symbolizes her good behavior intelligently to solve the problems she is going through and thinking Always wisely. If a pregnant woman sees a
